column2: Job Title:  Managed PRINT Services Primary Skill/Mandatory Skill-  Network Printer Management Key Role & Responsibilities: Responsible for managing the Network Printers and MFD[Multi-Function Devices\Printers].  Define and implement standard operating procedures for moves, new printer, remove, and retire requests and the supporting processes around the requests. Continue to update as processes change over time. Ensure all printers are complainant with organizational Information Security requirements. Plan and review all Print Services move requests for the regions.  Manage label printers and adjust according to printer models deployed. Hands on experience on MFD and label printers.  Hands on experience on Network Printers like: HP, Konica, Samsung, Lexmark, Zebra.  Be responsible for testing, configuration of new printers and firmware on client network. Managed print background, hands-on experience with ServiceNow and ServiceNow Asset Module a plus. Technical background and familiarity with networking and protocol i.e. hostname, IP subnet, DHCP, Networking etc. Works on escalated issue and P3 cases with multiple teams as per the requirement. Good communication skills for US\UK based project and good problem solving capabilities. Technical Skills Participate in cross-functional teams to troubleshoot and resolve, communicate complex incidents and deep underlying issues. Performance analysis and fine tuning of real time and batch systems. Assess operational readiness of new products / applications / flows. Drive non-functional requirements. Manage production defect changes and work closely with Development teams to provide strong governance for control for the applications in scope. Manage Vendor for prioritization of issues, continuous service improvement, process improvement and audit issues. Conduct Weekly service review track SLAs adherence from vendors. Manage a workload which is subject to changing priorities and demands. Ensure essential process / procedures are followed and contribute to defining standards.  Drive the change in culture to ensure Production Support best practices is implemented while ensuring partnerships with developers and business partners are strengthened. Execute continuous service improvement plan, process improvement and automation. Act as a facilitator and coordinate between various teams like Infrastructure, development team to resolve, analysis of root cause for complex issues and outages. Work across multiple application management areas and support teams to ensure high level of support service. Effectively communicate and interact with infrastructure and supporting technology groups across a distributed environment to drive problem resolution and service levels. Work closely with 1st & 2nd level support and development teams to ensure team is meeting the business requirements. Ensure team delivers on these priorities and communicated progress effectively to all stakeholders. Follow through to ensure incidents and problems are resolved according to SLA. ??,80324009156.0,2024-04-30,2024-07-29,EducationalOccupationalCredential,96.0,IT & Information Security,IT Infrastructure Services - Other,IT Services & Consulting,Printer Support

About the position: We are looking for Generative AI & ML Architect with 14+ Years of experience. Engage in Presales and Solutions activities in Generative AI / ML related opportunities with key customer stakeholders / CXOs. Understand customer pain points and create a well-crafted solution, including solution approach, technical architecture, supported by a Proof of Concept. Each of such threads needs to be pursued meticulously to closure. Role: Generative AI & ML Architect for Presales and Solutions Team Location: Bengaluru/ Pune Experience: 14 - 22 Years Job Type: Full Time Employment What you'll do: Understand key customer requirements as well as finer nuances w.r.t. Generative AI and ML, including how the solution would be integrated with the existing workflow, secured, tested, evaluated, and continuously improved. Create solution options - High level Approach and Architecture Diagrams with supporting narrative which would highlight key considerations / choices made in the solution. Create proof of Concept supporting the solution Assimilate existing accelerators and solutions in and around Generative AI and utilize them in Presales activities, client demos or while creating new PoC. Collaborate with current Presales and solutions team, Sales, and Account Team to bring out full value to the solution. Learn and undergo trainings to keep pace with the changing landscape of Generative AI Expertise you'll bring: Exposure to Presales activities would be preferred. 10-12 years of IT experience with at least 6 years in developing & deploying NLP based solutions, chatbots, Generative AI modules. Good understanding of Cloud Computing (Azure preferred). Sound understanding of Generative AI services like Azure Open AI, Whisper, GPT Vision, DALL-E, Co Pilot Studio as well as other services like Azure Functions, Azure Storage, Azure Queues, etc. Exposure to open source LLMs Understanding of fine tuning of LLMs Good experience in writing Python scripts, functions, and modular solutions Good understanding of Generative AI in multi-modal scenario (text, audio, video, images) Benefits: Competitive salary and benefits package Culture focused on talent development with quarterly promotion cycles and company-sponsored higher education and certifications Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies Employee engagement initiatives such as project parties, flexible work hours, and Long Service awards Annual health check-ups Insurance coverage: group term life, personal accident, and Mediclaim hospitalization for self, spouse, two children, and parents Our company fosters a values-driven and people-centric work environment that enables our employees to : Accelerate growth, both professionally and personally Impact the world in powerful, positive ways, using the latest technologies Enjoy collaborative innovation, with diversity and work-life wellbeing at the core Unlock global opportunities to work and learn with the industry's best Let's unleash your full potential at Persistent Persistent is an Equal Opportunity Employer and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any kind.??,230424010129.0,2024-04-23,2024-07-22,EducationalOccupationalCredential,168.0,IT & Information Security,IT Infrastructure Services - Other,IT Services & Consulting,Presales

Position - Sr. US IT Recruiter - State Clients - Onsite Location  - Madhapur, Hyderabad Shift Timings -  06:00 PM IST - 03:00 AM IST Work mode - Work from Office We are hiring for US IT Recruiter experienced with State Clients   Overview: We are seeking an experienced US IT Recruiter to join our team, focusing on sourcing, screening, and recruiting top IT talent for state government clients. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of state government recruitment processes and a proven track record of successfully placing candidates in IT roles within state agencies. Key Responsibilities: Utilize job boards, social media, networking events, and referrals to identify and attract qualified IT candidates. Conduct initial screenings, evaluate technical skills, and ensure candidates meet state government requirements. Work closely with state government hiring managers to understand their specific IT staffing needs and provide tailored recruitment solutions. Schedule and coordinate interviews between candidates and hiring managers, ensuring a smooth process. Assist in negotiating job offers, ensuring a competitive and fair process for both clients and candidates. Ensure all recruitment activities comply with state regulations and company policies. Documentation: Maintain accurate and thorough documentation of all candidate interactions and recruitment processes in the applicant tracking system (ATS). Qualifications: Bachelors Degree Minimum of 8 years of experience in IT recruitment, preferably with state or government clients. Strong understanding of state government recruitment processes, compliance, and regulations. Proven ability to source and attract top IT talent using various channels and tools. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Strong organizational and time management skills with the ability to handle multiple priorities. Proficiency with applicant tracking systems (ATS) and other recruitment software. Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment. Preferred Skills: Experience with VMS (Vendor Management Systems) used by state governments. Technical background or understanding of various IT roles and technologies. Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume to  karthik.bonam@zolon.com  with the subject line ??S IT Recruiter - State Clients Application.??,230524011711,2024-05-23,2024-08-21,EducationalOccupationalCredential,96,Human Resources,IT Recruiter,IT Services & Consulting,State
